Package DAO

Class DBCustomers

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.DBCustomers
  • public class DBCustomers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all database exchanges associated with Customer data.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
        This method returns a list of all customers in database. By using a Prepared statement, this method executes a database query to retrieve all customers stored in the database. Each tuple retrieved is used to create a Customer object which is added to a list and finally returned.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Customer objects.

      • getCustomer

        public static Customer getCustomer​(int customer_ID)
        This method is a getter, returns Customer object from database that matches specified customer ID number. By using a prepared statement, this method queries the database for customer data that matches user specified customer ID number.
        Parameters:
        customer_ID - ID number of customer
        Returns:
        Returns customer object identified by customer_ID.

      • addNewCustomer

        public static void addNewCustomer​(java.lang.String customerName,
                                  java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                  java.lang.String postalCode,
                                  java.lang.String phone,
                                  java.lang.String divisionName)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method inserts new customer into customers table in the database. A prepared statement is used to insert a new customer into the customers table of the database.
        Parameters:
        customerName - name of customer
        customerAddress - address of customer
        postalCode - postal code of customer
        phone - phone number of customer
        divisionName - name of division
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - In the event of an SQL error.

      • modifyCustomer

        public static void modifyCustomer​(int customerID,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String address,
                                  java.lang.String postalCode,
                                  java.lang.String phone,
                                  int divisionID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method updates existing customer data in the database. By using a prepared statement, customer data in the customers table is updated.
        Parameters:
        customerID - customer ID number
        name - customer name
        address - customer address
        postalCode - customer postal code
        phone - customer phone
        divisionID - customer division ID number
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - In the event of an SQL error.

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(int customerID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method deletes customer data from the database. By using a prepared statement, customer data specified by customerID is deleted from the customers table of the database.
        Parameters:
        customerID - ID number of customer
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - In the event of an SQL error.
